item.title: About Me
item.description: Personal Statement Hello, My name is Jun-Liszt Li. I am currently working as a postdoc researcher in David M. Sabatini lab (IOCB Boston and IOCB Prague), a leading center for nutrient sensing and growth control research. My research focus is to understand the upstream logic of mTORC1 nutrient sensing pathway. At the Sabatini Lab, I have been fortunate to receive rigorous training in biochemistry and mechanistic cell biology. This experience not only refined my experimental precision but also shaped the way I think about scientific questions ‚Äî emphasizing clarity, reproducibility, and the pursuit of fundamental molecular principles.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Currently, I live in Prague, Czech Republic ‚Äî one of the most beautiful cities in Europe and the world!üè∞. Prague is also a city that continues to inspire us with its rich history and beautiful architecture. For general inquiries, collaboration opportunities, or technical support, please reach out to me through email or interact with me in twitter/X(@poppingjun). We value your input and we look forward to connecting with you!
